name: Friends Forever-Indian Stories
description:
Friends Forever - Indian Stories – entertaining & interactive stories!

We present to you a game, that is highly engaging, compelling and will leave you wanting for more! Take a dip into these beautifully crafted stories – where you are the heroine of your life. To move ahead in your story, take your chances, make your choices – find the perfect end for your story.

From drama to rom-coms, from mystery to fantasy – choose a genre you like. Make friends, find love, choose your holidays – and go on a visual ride! Just remember, whatever you do – make your chances count.

Choose your own responses and go on a marvelous journey. Your answers will decide the fate of your story. With unique hidden objects included in the story, find the objects and enjoy the surprises!

Do you want to meet the love of your life? Is someone worthy of your trust? Do you want to investigate and find the blackmailer? The wish is only yours!

What’s In?
READ NOW: The Untold Destiny – There is no where you can be where you aren’t meant to be. Where will this journey of finding love take you? Will you be able to get over the betrayals? Or will you fall apart? Read now, and find out where your destiny takes you!

READ: Retake! – A story of struggles and success in Bollywood. Will you take the easy-way out or would you rather wait for your big break? Will you trust people in the industry? Will you find the love of your life? As you get on your journey in Bollywood, find your perfect end!

Download Friends Forever - Indian Stories @Games2Win from Apple App Store and let the fun begin!

Friends Forever - Indian Stories Features:
- Entertaining & Interactive stories
- Look for hidden objects & move ahead in your story
- Stories from various genres
- Explore different locations
- A different adventure each time you play a story
- Emotions come to life
- Now Available in 2 languages- English and Portuguese
